Navigation.Description: Western Transmission (Gujarat) Limited is operating in the state of Gujarat and Madhya Pradesh focused on power transmission business.

SubNavigation.Description: Know about Board of Directors and browse through Reports, framework and systems for corporate governance.
Investor communications and financial related information about Western Transmission (Gujarat) Limited.

ProfileSectionItems.Heading: Mr Ravi Jain (Non-Executive Director)
ProfileSectionItems.HTMLText: Ravi Jain is a Chartered Accountant with rich experience of more than 18 years. He is expert in area of Project & Corporate Finance, Treasury and Forex Management, He also handled M&A assignment. He had worked in firms namely Glenmark Pharmaceuticals, Essar Oil Limited (now Nayara Energy Limited), Adani Power Limited. Currently he is working as Head- Finance at Adani Transmission Limited.

ProfileSectionItems.Heading: Mr Shashank Sharma (Non-Executive Director)
ProfileSectionItems.HTMLText: Shashank Sharma, aged 37 years, holds degree in Electrical Engineer from Govt. College, Ujjai. He has also procured Executive Program in Management from AIIM, Ahmedabad. Mr Sharma has over 14 years of experience in Energy Sector.

ProfileSectionItems.Heading: Mr Ishwar Kailashnath Dubey (Managing Director)
ProfileSectionItems.HTMLText: Ishwar Kailashnath Dubey, aged 46 years, has done B Tech from Calicut University. He has also completed Diploma in Management from Institute of Management, NIRMA University, Ahmedabad. He has over more than 20 years of experience in Engineering, construction and Operations of Sub Stations of various voltage levels including HVDC & FACTS in various parts of India.
